In Kyiv, hundreds of people demonstrated on Thursday to demand more support for the country's armed forces. They want the authorities to prioritise spending on the war effort at a time when family and friends are dying on the front line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Finland says it will reseal its entire eastern border starting at 8pm on Friday due to an ongoing influx of migrants at two crossing points on its frontier with Russia that were temporarily reopened early on Thursday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
